Class DefaultCatalogBasedMigrationProvider

java.lang.Object
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.DefaultCatalogBasedMigrationProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ordered, ResourceBasedMigrationProvider
public final class DefaultCatalogBasedMigrationProvider extends Object implements ResourceBasedMigrationProvider
Default handler for xml resources.
Since:
1.7.0
Author:
Michael J. Simons
